though wine, or just opening up firefox or something?

well, dont wory about a virus or anything, I've nvr had a virus in linux and I've been using it for over a decade...

it sounds like the app you are running, is triggering some bug in X that is killing it, and it simply restarts...

are you doing this through wine? I had a probelm with wine killing the X server on the last coupld of versions - but I thought it was just my funky setup...
